recipesJson.name: Turkish
recipesJson.author: BlackMods
recipesJson.description:
Version 7.2
Days 1-5 the Turkish Delight will dominate everything and the chocolate is sitting at the back. 
Days 5+ the Raspberry, Turkish and Jammy Wizard settle down and meld together to form the rose jelly whilst letting the chocolate through.

Adjust Sweetener to suit but these things are sickly sweet so 1% Super Sweet is a good comprimise.
